DOC.brief_summary: This study conduct evaluate adult men erectile dysfunction ( often call impotence ) , effect vardenafil HCl quality erection . Many men experience occasional erectile problem live . The cause erectile dysfunction vary may due physiological emotional reason . This study design study responsiveness erection quality scale ( EQS ) vardenafil HCl . In study , vardenafil HCl compare placebo . Placebo pill look like real drug . It contain active ingredient .
DOC.brief_title: Investigate Responsiveness Erectile Quality Scale Vardenafil Flexible Dose v Placebo Males With Erectile Dysfunction ( ED )
DOC.criteria: Males ED least six month Heterosexual relationship . Males 18 old . Primary hypoactive sexual desire . History myocardial infarction , stroke lifethreatening arrhythmia within prior 6 month . Stable heterosexual relationship > 6 month Other exclusion criterion apply accord US Product Information
